duties_responsibilities.duty: Complete assigned work orders, including preventative maintenance and repairs in accordance with established policies and safety standards.
Prepare vacant apartment homes for leasing and new move-ins by completing maintenance tasks and inspections.
Assist in maintaining the grounds, common areas, and amenities by performing general cleaning and upkeep.
Support cost-cutting and expense control programs by fixing, not replacing, parts when possible and practicing correct use of tools and equipment.

education_certification.credential: Trade certification or equivalent experience in maintenance, HVAC, electrician, plumbing, or related field.
